text: Piper dodsonii is a species of plant in the family Piperaceae. It is endemic to Ecuador. ==References== * Santiana, J. & Pitman, N. 2004. Piper dodsonii. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 23 August 2007. Category:Flora of Ecuador dodsonii Category:Endangered plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Piper dodsonii
